title.rendered: Gore Canyon: the ultimate Colorado whitewater rafting trip

content.rendered:
Today is the official start of our 2010 Gore Canyon rafting season! 13 people will head out today to tackle the most challenging commercial whitewater rafting trip in Colorado. This trip runs for the next 5 weekends, Friday through Monday. Our very best guides at AVA will take you through the towering canyon and multiple Class V drops. Read more about our Gore Canyon rafting trips to see if this is the right trip for you.
Don’t forget–our Pine Creek and Numbers rafting trip (“The Gauntlet”) is still running great. This full-day Class IV-V trip on the Arkansas is the premiere rafting adventure on the Arkansas River and is a great test to see if Gore Canyon is for you. This trip will be going through August 15. See the rafting discount we’re currently running on The Gauntlet trip!
Call us today at 800-370-0581 to find out more!
